message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me there?
Thank you for the counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $98?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I can offer the product to you for $102.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $99. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $101.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $100. Can you meet me there?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $101, but that's as low as I can go.
